official_title: A bill to provide for a comparison study of the costs and other factors associated with the establishment of reimbursement guidelines for respiratory therapy.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to conduct a study assessing the cost effectiveness of reimbursing providers of respiratory therapy according to an hourly salary equivalency system and the effect of such a proposed system upon the quality of respiratory therapy services.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a comparison study of the costs and other factors associated with the establishment of reimbursement guidelines for respiratory therapy.
